backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with data types for books, meditation, journaling, user profiles, progress, rituals, and supporting storage/authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing theme-token and UI-token audit requirements with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of multiple frontend files including routing, global styling, hooks, pages, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content provided.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root mount node and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, React Query, theme provider, Internet Identity provider, and mounts core routes and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel for selecting ambient sounds with swipe navigation, mute toggle, and dynamically managed looping audio playback.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty file with no content provided.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Animated floating navigation bar linking to Journal, Progress, and Books pages with hover labels.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu supporting theme switching, authentication actions, and navigation with cached-query cleanup on logout.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: A 3D lotus model with animated petals, stem, and glow that react to growth state parameters and theme colors.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: A particle system around the lotus that animates between chaotic and coherent motion based on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus with particles, glow, and theme/variant-based visibility effects.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Swipeable meditation selector carousel with circular navigation and animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Step-by-step meditation guide with swipe navigation, dot controls, and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered glowing bowl that fills based on total meditation minutes with animated liquid waves.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus visualization using react-three-fiber, particles, and growth calculations based on total minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: Animated SVG lotus whose layers, glow, and breathing scale depend on growth state and streak.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: A multi-step quiz dialog that collects user answers and computes a recommended meditation type based on scored options.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: A swipeable carousel for browsing, starting, and deleting saved meditation rituals with touch and button navigation.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays login status and provides guest-return and logout actions while clearing relevant cached queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching meditation data, quotes, sessions, and guest/local fallbacks, integrating actor and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styles, themes, colors, and animation utilities for the frontend.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports an extended Book type and a list of book recommendation objects with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Implements a swipeable, theme-aware carousel UI for browsing book recommendations with navigation and decorative components.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard with theme toggle, daily quote selection, meditation start logic, ritual management, and various UI components.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal interface with search, filtering, editing, mood/energy icons, favorites, import/export, and CRUD actions on journal entries.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with theme toggle, animated intro, login via Internet Identity, and guest mode navigation to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Pre-meditation setup page providing mood/energy selection, ambient sound options, guided steps, and session/ritual saving.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Progress tracking page showing minutes, streaks, ranks, and supports data import/export with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus visual growth state from total minutes using phased thresholds and smooth interpolation for geometry, vividness, and layer openness.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Manages guest-only meditation data in localStorage, including migration, journal entries, progress tracking, and rituals.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines meditation rank tiers by total minutes and provides helpers to get current/next rank and minutes until advancement.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters (including hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them safely from the address bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and layout settings with custom OKLCH-based theme vars.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project version, app features, and system capabilities for the meditation app.
